casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Seaga Edward GILLARD 316A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 13, 2019 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Gillard, Seaga Edward. David J. Saacks, Assistant District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Gillard, Seaga Edward. Katie Pomeroy, Assistant District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of August 2019 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of August 2019."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 13th day of September 2019 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
